Text:
Translated - Hitman Pro V3.5.9.126 [mp3pro1986]

Windows (32 and 64 bit)

Use Hitman Pro as a second opinion to scan your computer for malware. Hitman Pro uses a scan cloud. In so-called cloud scan are leading antivirus solutions such as G Data, Prevx, Emsisoft and Icarus.

Within 1 or 2 minutes you will know if malware is running on your system.

1. Unpacking.

2. Hitman Pro start.

3. Done!
